name: Player

Big Footprint.AGGRESSIVE: THIS IS YOUR FOOTPRINT ISN'T IT?... TELL ME NOW
Big Footprint.NICE: Hey I like your shoes, are they the same as this footprint?

Small Footprint.AGGRESSIVE: THIS IS YOUR FOOTPRINT ISN'T IT?... TELL ME NOW
Small Footprint.NICE: Hey I like your shoes, are they the same as this footprint?

Glasses.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU NEEED TO WEAR GLASSES?...  TELL ME NOW, OR ELSE!
Glasses.NICE: Hey, I think you'd look great in these glasses I've found, have you ever seen them before?

Bag.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU OWN A BAG!?... TELL ME NOW!
Bag.NICE: You seem like someone with a keen eye for fashion, what do you think about this bag?

Lipstick.AGGRESSIVE: IS THAT LIPSTICK YOU ARE WEARING?
Lipstick.NICE: Your lips look great, do you wear lipstick?

Right Handed.AGGRESSIVE: ARE YOU OR ARE YOU NOT RIGHT HANDED!?... TELL ME NOW AND YOU BETTER NOT LIE!
Right Handed.NICE: Your right arm is big and strong, I'm sure you must be right handed to get it to that stage?

Dark Hair.AGGRESSIVE: DO YOU HAVE DARK HAIR!?... YOU BETTER NOT ANSWER SARCASTICALLY!
Dark Hair.NICE: I can't tell if that hair is part of your costume, can you tell me what colour your actual hair is?

noneResponses: Sorry I am a little busy for questions right now.
And why do you think I would help you.
